title: Kafr Aqareb
description: An ancient place, located in modern Syria, with remains of Roman praetorium, a temple and grottoes for pagan worship, a Byzantine basilica, and a large communal reservoir. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2011 as part of the "Ancient Villages of Northern Syria."

properties.description: Approximate centerpoint of the ruins of Kafr Aqareb. Coordinates determined by eye in Google Earth in November 2012, following description in UNESCO World Heritage List.
properties.title: Kafr Aqareb
